subject: Baseball
Amphetamines
Steroids
Athletics and Sports
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Neifi Pérez, a veteran utility infielder for the Detroit Tigers, has become the first major league player to be suspended for using a banned amphetamine.
snippet: Neifi Pérez, a veteran utility infielder for the Detroit Tigers, has become the first major league player to be suspended for using a banned amphetamine.
